podcasts.title: Serial
podcasts.description: Investigative journalism that unfolds one story over multiple episodes.

podcasts.title: This American Life
podcasts.description: Weekly public radio program and podcast featuring journalism, essays, memoirs, field recordings, short fiction, and more.

podcasts.title: Stuff You Should Know
podcasts.description: Educates listeners on a wide variety of topics, often using popular culture as a reference.

podcasts.title: Philosophy Bites
podcasts.description: Short interviews with leading philosophers on bite-sized topics, making complex philosophical concepts accessible to everyone.

podcasts.title: The Joe Rogan Experience
podcasts.description: Long-form conversations with guests from various backgrounds.

podcasts.title: Radiolab
podcasts.description: Investigates a strange world through science, philosophy, and human experience.

podcasts.title: 99% Invisible
podcasts.description: Explores the process and power of design and architecture in our everyday lives.

podcasts.title: Planet Money
podcasts.description: Explains complex economic issues in an entertaining and accessible way.

podcasts.title: The Daily
podcasts.description: Daily news podcast from The New York Times.

podcasts.title: Freakonomics Radio
podcasts.description: Explores the hidden side of everything, with a blend of storytelling and entertainment along with statistics and science.

podcasts.title: Reply All
podcasts.description: A podcast about the internet and modern life, featuring stories about how people shape the internet and how the internet shapes people.

podcasts.title: How I Built This
podcasts.description: Explores the stories behind some of the world's best known companies and the movements they built.

podcasts.title: Crime Junkie
podcasts.description: Weekly true crime podcast dedicated to giving you a fix of true crime stories.

podcasts.title: The History of Rome
podcasts.description: Comprehensive chronological narrative of Roman history from its legendary founding to the fall of the Western Empire.

podcasts.title: TED Talks Daily
podcasts.description: Thought-provoking ideas on every subject imaginable, from artificial intelligence to zoology.

podcasts.title: Heavyweight
podcasts.description: Jonathan Goldstein goes back to the moment everything changed and helps people fix it. A journey through time to recover what was lost.

podcasts.title: Science Vs
podcasts.description: Science Vs takes on fads, trends, and the opinionated mob to find out what's fact, what's not, and what's somewhere in between.

podcasts.title: Welcome to Night Vale
podcasts.description: A fictional radio show set in the peculiar desert town of Night Vale, featuring community updates, mysterious lights, and dark humor.

podcasts.title: The Anthropocene Reviewed
podcasts.description: Reviews different facets of the human-centered planet on a five-star scale, exploring the contradictions of human existence.

podcasts.title: Maintenance Phase
podcasts.description: Debunking the junk science behind health fads, wellness scams, and nonsensical nutrition advice.

podcasts.title: My Favorite Murder
podcasts.description: True crime comedy podcast hosted by comedians discussing murder cases and personal stories with humor.

podcasts.title: The Daily Stoic
podcasts.description: Daily meditation on Stoic philosophy, incorporating wisdom from ancient philosophers into modern contexts.

podcasts.title: Darknet Diaries
podcasts.description: True stories from the dark side of the Internet, featuring hackers, breaches, shadow government activity, and more.

podcasts.title: You're Wrong About
podcasts.description: Reconsiders past events, people, and phenomena that have been miscast in the public imagination.

podcasts.title: Twenty Thousand Hertz
podcasts.description: Explores the stories behind the world's most recognizable and interesting sounds.

podcasts.title: Philosophize This!
podcasts.description: Beginner-friendly podcast exploring philosophical concepts and thinkers throughout history.

podcasts.title: Code Switch
podcasts.host: Gene Demby and Shereen Marisol Meraji
podcasts.description: Fearless conversations about race and how it impacts every part of society.

podcasts.title: Sleep With Me
podcasts.description: Boring bedtime stories to help you fall asleep, designed to distract your racing mind.

podcasts.title: Hidden Brain
podcasts.description: Uses science and storytelling to explore unconscious patterns that drive human behavior.

podcasts.title: Sawbones
podcasts.host: Dr. Sydnee McElroy and Justin McElroy
podcasts.description: A marital tour of misguided medicine, exploring the history of medical missteps and achievements.

podcasts.title: Invisibilia
podcasts.description: Explores the invisible forces that shape human behavior, including ideas, beliefs, assumptions, and emotions.

podcasts.title: Behind the Bastards
podcasts.description: Focuses on the worst people in history, exploring the origins and impacts of dictators, cult leaders, and more.

podcasts.title: Throughline
podcasts.description: Goes back in time to understand the present, revealing the connections between historical events and current issues.

podcasts.title: The Happiness Lab
podcasts.description: Shares research-backed insights about the science of happiness and well-being.

podcasts.title: Writing Excuses
podcasts.host: Brandon Sanderson, Mary Robinette Kowal, and others
podcasts.description: Short, fast-paced podcast for writers by writers, covering techniques, craft, and business.

podcasts.title: Football Weekly
podcasts.description: Guardian's football experts analyze recent matches and discuss the biggest stories in the football world.

podcasts.title: The Food Chain
podcasts.description: Examines the economics, science, and cultural significance of food, and what it takes to put food on your plate.

podcasts.title: The Travel Diaries
podcasts.description: Celebrity guests reveal their travel stories, from childhood holidays to faraway adventures and favorite destinations.

podcasts.title: Game Scoop!
podcasts.description: IGN's flagship gaming podcast covers industry news, reviews, and in-depth discussions about video games.

podcasts.title: The Investor's Podcast
podcasts.description: Provides investment strategies and educates listeners on financial markets, business, and wealth creation.

podcasts.title: Song Exploder
podcasts.description: Musicians deconstruct their songs and tell the stories behind their creation, revealing how they were made.

podcasts.title: Everything is Alive
podcasts.description: Unscripted interviews with inanimate objects, bringing everyday items to life through imaginative conversations.

podcasts.title: The Moth
podcasts.description: True stories told live without notes, featuring everyday people sharing extraordinary personal experiences.

podcasts.title: Science Friday
podcasts.description: Explores science news and entertaining stories about science, technology, health, and the environment.

podcasts.title: Dissect
podcasts.description: Season-long deep dives into influential albums, analyzing one song per episode with meticulous detail.

podcasts.title: The Mindful Minute
podcasts.description: Guided meditations and mindfulness practices designed to reduce stress and increase well-being.

podcasts.title: Ologies
podcasts.description: Science communication podcast where experts in different "-ologies" share their specialized knowledge with humor and accessibility.

podcasts.title: No Such Thing As A Fish
podcasts.description: The QI researchers share the most interesting facts they discovered during the week with humor and wit.

podcasts.title: How I Built This
podcasts.description: Narratives behind innovative companies, featuring interviews with entrepreneurs about their journeys.

podcasts.title: The Last Archive
podcasts.description: Examines how we know what we know and why it matters, exploring the evolution of evidence and truth.

podcasts.title: Anime Out of Context
podcasts.description: Weekly discussions about anime series, featuring episode breakdowns, cultural analysis, and industry news. Covers both classic and current anime with special guest interviews.

podcasts.title: Sharingan Chronicles
podcasts.description: Dive deep into the lore of iconic anime like Naruto, with weekly episodes that break down character arcs, legendary battles, and the real-world inspirations behind the Sharingan and more.

podcasts.title: Anime Patterns: From Tropes to Trends
podcasts.description: Explore the recurring themes, character tropes, and narrative patterns in anime—from mecha to magical girls. Weekly discussions include cultural commentary and exclusive interviews with creators.
